verbs.description: Trump [V: has] rebuked Puerto Rico for its growing debt in the aftermath of Hurricane Maria , but a long history of neglect by Washington is what 's really to blame .
[ARG0: Trump] has [V: rebuked] [ARG1: Puerto Rico] [ARG2: for its growing debt in the aftermath of Hurricane Maria] , but a long history of neglect by Washington is what 's really to blame .
Trump has rebuked Puerto Rico for its [V: growing] [ARG1: debt] in the aftermath of Hurricane Maria , but a long history of neglect by Washington is what 's really to blame .
Trump has rebuked Puerto Rico for its growing debt in the aftermath of Hurricane Maria , but [ARG1: a long history of neglect by Washington] [V: is] [ARG2: what 's really to blame] .
